name: Schedule Workflow
description: Schedule a workflow to run on a cron schedule (daily, weekly, monthly, or custom cron expression). Creates recurring jobs in the job_executions table for autonomous business operations.

workflow_id.description: ID of the workflow to schedule

schedule.description: Cron expression or preset: 'daily', 'weekly', 'monthly', or cron format '0 9 * * *'

space_id.description: Optional space ID (defaults to current space)

context.description: Optional context data to pass to workflow on each execution

enabled.description: Whether the schedule is enabled (default: true)
